Details: Kalgachia - At Showpur vill | As per report received from PWD (Roads) dept. on 29/07/22, due to continuous river bank erosion of Beki river the road embankment (SH2 in Showpur) has been eroded from Ch. 49.750 Km to 49.820 Km of SH2. (Length = 70.00 m, Width = 4.00 m, Height = 2.80 m and location coordinate = 26.333175, 90.881433) Date of occurrence - 28/07/22 | 0

Dhubri - Airanjangla Pt-III | Erosion is going(by the river Brahmaputra) at village Airanjangla Pt-III,As per the field verification w.e.f 24/7/22 to 29/07/22 it is seen that till now 13 nos of family has been affected (total area = 4Bigha-2Katha-15Lessa)and they have shifted their houses to another place.
